items.text: short, wide, slashed away to third man
items.postText: Welcome back. Alzarri to start and Tamim on strike.
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, whipped one-bounce to deep backward square
items.shortText: Joseph to Anamul Haque, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, cuts back in and finds the inside edge as it to just miss the stumps and run away to the boundary
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: width on offer again, slashed to deep point
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: shortish outside off, defended
items.shortText: Joseph to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: short, angled in, pulled away to deep backward square
items.shortText: Joseph to Anamul Haque, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length, straightens on middle, inside-edged
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full and wide, crashed down the ground past mid-off diving to his right
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, FOUR runs

items.text: this one's the best of the lot so far. West Indies are doling out some crap at the moment.. this one's short and heaved over deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, SIX runs

items.text: the only thing that could make this worse - a massive no-ball as he oversteps and tumbles over. Could have been a no-ball for height too had he not overstepped as it slipped out of the hand and it's slashed away to point
items.postText: Some sand being unpacked in that area now after that slip-up.
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, no run

items.text: a wide on the free-hit as he tries to take it away from the batsman outside off
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, 1 wide

items.text: full on the pads, clipped off the pads and chipped just over mid-on as Jason Mohammed chases it down
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, 2 runs

items.text: THIS. IS. HUUUUGE.... a massive six as Holder fires this extremely full and he charges down the track and drills it straight over long-on with the full face of the bat and a massive six
items.shortText: Holder to Anamul Haque, SIX runs

items.text: back of a length, keeps the bat inside the line as it angles across off
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length on off, blocked to mid-off for a quick single
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: overambitious! Tries to play one shot too many and charges down the track. Swipes helplessly as this one's shortish and comes to him at pace before straightening and beating the swipe to take out the top of off stump. Alzarri gives him a send-off as he signals to him to go away.. might land him in some trouble there.
items.shortText: Joseph to Anamul Haque, OUT

items.text: length on the pads, tucked to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched through the covers
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, drifts down the leg side
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: full curves into him, drills it away through midwicket off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: short of good length on off, punched to mid-off who dives to his left
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: AJ: "Joseph is an old school quick, always scowling and not afraid to say something"
items.text: short of a length, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, left alone outside off
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: through the gap. Capitalises on the width on offer to cut late straight through cover and point
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs
